name: Interactive Scripting Final (cj.ables)
description:
Unity project for my final, First Person Shooter with randomized guns, three enemy behaviors, and ammo for the guns! Tried to shoot for a sci-fi/surreal game. But it's a bit of an "eyesore" at the moment. 

Unity project is hosted on my Github.

https://github.com/cjables/IntScriptFinal/tree/main

Youtube
